website_summaries.verdict: Smaller design is perfect for offices, bathrooms, or any place you need a small trash can.
pros: Carrying handle makes it easy to move around
Removable inner bucket makes cleaning easy
Double steel pedal is durable and lasts for more than 3,000 steps
Can be used with plastic grocery bags
cons: Lightweight bin moves around when you step on the pedal

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting this to be so small good product but not worth the value.
customer_reviews.author: Sarahangela23

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: In one of the cans the foot pedal broken after less than a week of using (and believe me we were not pushing hard). I asked for a partial refund, which I am still waiting on. Also the bags get very easily stuck so it is difficult to empty the cans. Also, with these trash cans even if you push down on the items you throw out, they get stuck to the top and it can easily fool you into thinking the can is full when is not even halfway full.
customer_reviews.author: xxxx

customer_reviews.title: The container is small, and it’s difficult to use ...
customer_reviews.text: The container is small, and it’s difficult to use bags because of the removable bucket. The can tends to scoot around when I step on it because it doesn’t weigh very much.
customer_reviews.author: V. Savage

customer_reviews.title: SMALL
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. Wish was taller for the tight space I need it in.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vega

customer_reviews.title: Just what you need
customer_reviews.text: Just what you need when your in an apartment. Not too large not too small. And I love it does not slam when lid closes.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: The correct mesurments.
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I thought it would be much bigger. I wanted it for my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged two cans have dents. Now I have to waste my time and money to return.
customer_reviews.author: Mike A

customer_reviews.title: It’s a bin.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bin. Arrived dented, box it came in was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The big one came With a couple dents, but other that that they were great.
customer_reviews.author: DAWN F.

customer_reviews.title: ... arrived with a dent in the front corner- not happy
customer_reviews.text: Can arrived with a dent in the front corner- not happy
customer_reviews.author: Janelle R Lutz

customer_reviews.title: I had to return this because it was way too ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this because it was way too small. There was no capacity given in the description. I should have asked someone but I didn't. It was half the price of the touchless one that we were considering so we assumed it was the same size. It was less than half the size.
customer_reviews.author: S Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Cute Can Keeps The Cat Out
customer_reviews.text: Cute little can keeps pets out because the recessed lid won't pry open. You have to step on the pedal. This is my second one. Would recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Dave

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Narrow Trash Can
customer_reviews.text: This is a great narrow trash can I purchased for our bathroom which I needed for a narrow space. I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 because it is not a soft closing lid but I still like the look and that it has a removable inside to take out the trash.
customer_reviews.author: P. Foster

customer_reviews.title: sturdy, easy open lid using well made foot pedal
customer_reviews.text: sturdy, easy open lid using well made foot pedal. I like the narrow design - fits nicely into bathroom or kitchen area without taking up precious space.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Great for my guest bathroom so I don't have to ...
customer_reviews.text: My miniature pinscher was an expert at trash cans even with lids, but this one has bested her. Great for my guest bathroom so I don't have to worry about keeping the door closed. Good size too.
customer_reviews.author: L. Turner

customer_reviews.title: It keeps your dog out of trouble!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and ease of use. Solid and well made. Most importantly it's beagle-proof!
customer_reviews.author: Hapi Tami

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's beautiful but it doesn't hold much and it's hard to put a bag into
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Evers

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Cute trash can. Quite small. Won't fit much but does fit nicely next to a toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and fits right in the space as I hoped it would!
customer_reviews.author: bbkatt

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Arrived dented even though packaging looks perfectly. Now have to go through annoyance of sending back in and re-purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Well made and fits just fine in my small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Topping

customer_reviews.title: Dog proof!
customer_reviews.text: Well packaged, no dents! This is 2nd purchase, orig was slightly rusted on the side that was exposed to the shower. Not bad considering it was 10+ yrs old. Got this w lid so dog couldn’t fish garbage out of open can!
customer_reviews.author: Bens mom

customer_reviews.title: love this set
customer_reviews.text: I needed garbage cans with lids for work and did not want the automatic/electronic ones (something to fail). Tried this set and was so pleased I bought a second set for another location. The small cans are quite small but work well I am not completely please with how a garbage sack sits in the cans, but still 5 stars for look, function, quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu Planks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. The pull out containers have handles so you just pull them up out of the stainless steel can and dump them.
customer_reviews.author: Connie C. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Love this, great quality and the color, shape, size, and performance is exactly as described and I expected. Wow, how refreshing is that!!!
customer_reviews.author: Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it, to keep the dog out of the trash! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Wendy S. Rosko

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Fits beside the sink just perfectly! Removable can insert makes it very easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Nice size.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the size is perfect for bedroom use. And you don't need to put a garbage bag in because it comes with a little bucket. And this looks high class too. But you can put in a plastic garbage bag too if you want to. (Just like what I did) Cons: may be a little bit small for kitchen use if you have a lot of garbage from kitchen everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Do not waist your money.
customer_reviews.text: Although customer service was great and sent replacement for original shipment quickly as it came without the stepper, replacement broke in 2 month.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tight Spaces
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as described, very narrow and fits well into tight spaces. Mine was well-packaged and arrived undamaged and in perfect condition. The lid flips up easily so you can toss things into it quickly while still keeping the trash out of sight. The inside has a handle and pulls out for easy emptying. If you really need a liner you can put one in there but it is difficult because of the handle attachment.
customer_reviews.author: Itsazoo2

customer_reviews.title: I wish the lifter lid stainless steel
customer_reviews.text: This looks very modern and works as advertised. The reason that I have only rated it 4 instead of 5 is because the space inside of the tank is not as big as it should. The lifted lid would be ideal if it's stainless steel lid. Also, I had issue with the lifted lid. The plastic lid doesn't close All the way time to time when you places store liner bag. Overall, I like about this purchase since it's super lightweight and looks modern in my room.
customer_reviews.author: Jay-Z

customer_reviews.title: Great to keep pets out of the garbage!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It is the perfect size for our bathroom and it keeps the cats and dogs out of the garbage. It looks nice and it fits into narrow spaces.
customer_reviews.author: PLM

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this small trash can
customer_reviews.text: I am quite happy with this little can. It is well made and fits nicely in any nook or cranny. I use it in my bath to keep the dog from raiding the trash! It is small, but that is an advantage where I use it. The inner can has a handle and it is easy to remove and line with the small trash can liners. I use a file band to keep them in place when I replace the liner can, because it is a snug fit. With the lid in place, my dog doesn't even realize there is anything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Tidy Little Can with Liner
customer_reviews.text: Very tidy for my Airbnb guest. You don't have to look at the trash, and it has a handy removable insert for easy cleaning. I put a Walmart bag in, and it's not visible. Very tidy little can.
customer_reviews.author: Travellini

customer_reviews.title: Really nice bin! Have to use the pedal to open
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bin! Have to use the pedal to open, very hard to open the top with a hand like some other small bathrooms bins are - makes it somewhat child proof. Looks really nice and holds a lot for its size
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really small. Not for kitchen. Maybe for bathroom. Difficult to get plastic bag to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: JY

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product .
customer_reviews.text: Really love this step on trash can. It's just the right size for our small bathroom. You do need to purchase liners for it, but even though compact it holds quite a lot before you have to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small but perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: Small but perfect for my office. Opens easily and I love that I can pull out the inner basket to take it to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Waste basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Fits perfect in the tight space in my bathroom & I like that there is an inner basket, with handle, for easy emptying.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: for very narrow space
customer_reviews.text: Works good. It's a little too small. My bad didn't cleck the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: J. Fryman

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me...
customer_reviews.text: This was well-made, but it did not fit the need for which I bought it. I returned it....
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L. Wilber

customer_reviews.title: A good deal
customer_reviews.text: Good size and it keeps me puppy out of the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I was loking for to put in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Derek G. Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect, She can't get it open
customer_reviews.text: I bought this trash can because we have a dog that keeps getting into the trash by lifting the lid with her nose. It's perfect, She can't get it open.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: It is a little too big fro my bathroom but ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a little too big fro my bathroom but I change with the one in my office and works well there.
customer_reviews.author: cm303

product_meta.title: Fortune Candy Step Trash Can,Carbon Steel Garbage Can with Lid and Plastic Inner Bucket for Bathroom (1.3+1.3+8 Gallon)
product_meta.description:
Color:1.3+1.3+8 GallonColor: Brushed Stainless Steel /Silver 
Size: 8 Gallon/30L & 2pcs of 1.3Gallon/5L 

The Fortune Candy classical set of 3 round trash can has 2different sizes the large 8 Gallon one it’s perfect for home kitchen and the two 1.3 Gallon cans are great for relative small spaces in home or office, such as under an office desk or in a bathroom. Durable foot pedal with rubber surface and stainless steel construction anti-slippery while stepping. An inner removable bucket makes trash disposal easy and the lid soft closing fitting creates a smooth and silent closing experience. Anti-fingerprint commercial grade stainless steel, best for kitchen, office, living room and bedroom

 *Product Specifications: 
Capacity: 8 Gallon/30L & 2pcs of 1.3 Gallon / 5L 
Color: Stainless Steel /Silver
Design: Brushed Finish
Material: Stainless Steel 18/0 SS
Thickness: 0.3mm 
Plastic: Primary Plastic (PP)
Product Net Weight: 169.3ounce / 6.17kg
Product Size: 7.9x7.9x11.2inch / 20x20x28cm (1.3Gallon) 11.4x11.4x25.2inch/29x29x64cm (8Gallon)


* Package Including: 2pc x 1.3 Gallon & 1pc x 8 Gallon Brushed Stainless Steel Trash Can 


* Warranty: 5 Year Warranty for All Fortune Candy Trash Cans 


 Fortune Candy Brand: We are passionate about offering a simple, stylish and durable designed quality and affordable brand homeware products to our valued customers. All Fortune Candy brand products are designed by our exclusive team of designers and creators who dedicated their creativity and enthusiasm towards design the simple and stylish products which sets us apart and ensures that Fortune Candy is able to retain a strong and proud sense of its own identity through design, quality, function, manufacturing, customer service and of course innovation.
feature_bullets: Set of 3 Round Step Trash Can: The large 8 Gallon is perfect for kitchens at home, and the other two trash cans fit well in bathrooms or under office desks.
No-Slip Pedal: With rubber surface for anti-slippery prevention, it prevents slippery when you step up can,safe and stable.
Product Size: Measures the large one is 11.4 x 11.4 x 25.2 inches, the 1.3 gal one is 7.9 x 7.9 x 11.2 inches, Perfect for your kitchen,bathroom or elsewhere in your home.
Steady Foot Pedal: The durable pedal design makes it easy to lift the lid without using your hands, And the handle on the back of trash can could easily move the trash can.

2-Year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee: We use the best materials and solid engineering so our products will last for usage for years. If there is any question or problem, please feel free to let us know. We will solve it and guarantee 100% satisfaction.
